column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. BRIDGE HAS BEEN SECURED. SEND IN THE TROOPS. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. RUSSIAN REINFORCEMENTS ARE DEAD. CHARLIE AND DELTA CAN HANDLE IT FROM NOW ON. OVER.
ALPHA TO BRAVO. READY TO GO HOME. COME TO PICK US UP. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR FAST ROPING. LOWER YOUR GOGGLES. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GOOD LUCK BOYS. GO GET THEM, WE ARE HEADING HOME. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. ON OUR WAY. HOLD TIGHT. OVER.
DELTA TO ALPHA BLACK. WE ARE TAKING OVER NOW, THANKS FOR CAPTURING THIS BABY FOR US NICE JOB. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. UNDERSTOOD. KEEP IT SECURE UNTIL THE REINFORCEMENTS ARRIVE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. CALL YOUR HELO, TIME FOR YOU TO RETURN TO BASE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME HOME. OVER.
